## ReferenceTypeSchema interface

Type Reference, infers that this type should be equivalent to target type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReferenceTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

If target type is in a namespace, the schema should be like below.

Type:

```ts
import { SomeNS } from './some-ns';
type Reference = SomeNS.Target;

```
Schema:

```json
{
    type: "Reference",
    target: "./some-ns/SomeNS.Target"
}

```
When parsing a type reference, if `target` includes point, namespace would be parsed by `target.split('.')`<!-- -->. If `target` doesn't include point, it would be treated as a type name.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [target](./tsbuffer-schema.referencetypeschema.target.md) | string | SchemaID of reference target |
|  [type](./tsbuffer-schema.referencetypeschema.type.md) | 'Reference' |  |
